text: There is no place for life in Nagash domain, flesh will rot and bones will crumble, even earth itself rises to form great walls to deter living invaders.
The whole world will bow to the True God.
Each defeated skeleton warrior shall be replaced by ten more, as an endless sea of undead marches on.
The Power of Nagash is immeasurable, as is his hat.
We're in the end game now
This settlement has been blessed with Nagash's presence.
Can only be applied once per province and only on generic settlements.
It'll make target undead faction a vassal under Nagash

Exert your influence to seize control of this faction, turning them into a loyal [[img:icon_vassal]][[/img]]vassal. The target faction must have reached 100% [[img:icon_blood_kiss]][[/img]]vampiric Influence. The total [[img:icon_blood_kiss]][[/img]]vampiric influence required to reach this threshold depends on the targetâ€™s race and number of settlements.

Send your followers out into the mortal world. They will establish [[img:lahmia_cult]][[/img]]cults in up to 3 human, Elf, Dwarf, or Ogre-owned settlements.\\n\\n[[img:lahmia_cult]][[/img]]Cult buildings allow you to increase your [[img:icon_blood_kiss]][[/img]]Vampiric influence over certain factions.
The Magical Forest is a gateway by which all manner of spirits travel.
The spirits of the forest have been known to kidnap whole armies, whisking them away into the dark.

The Magical Forest is a gateway by which all manner of spirits travel.
The spirits of the forest have been known to kidnap whole armies, whisking them away into the dark.
Sometimes the land itself is a prison, refusing to set its victims free.
Being perpetually haunted by the dead is no way to live.
Angry spirits descend on the unwary, desperate to be joined in death.
Some spells do little more than to inspire generosity among one's enemies.
Enthralled minds are often the most giving, impoverishing themselves to pay tribute to their master.
Corruption must be cleansed, wherever its infection spreads.
Where the land is purified by blinding light, corruption can no longer hold sway.
The armies of Kislev's enemies crumble, burdened by the darkest of magics.
